channel.title: Vindred - SPAWN PK - BITCOIN GAMBLING
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/1R95YN6.png[/img]
<--[URL=http://"https://vindred.com"]Home[/URL]--[URL=http://"https://vindred.com/vote.php"]Vote[/URL]--[URL=http://"http://vindred.com/client/Vindred.jar"]Client[/URL]--[URL=http://"https://reddit.com/r/vindred"]Community[/URL]-->[/center]
[b]Vindred is a special server. You get Spawn PKing, Bossing, Minigames, Cases and Gambling all in one! Loading unique OSRS items we offer you the best experience you could possible get. Join Today![/b]
[b]FAQ[/b] Q: What is "Gambling" A: At Vindred you can buy ingame tokkul as BTC or Paypal. Then you can PK, Trade, Duel, do the flower game or enter the daily lottery with said Tokkul. Whenever you want you can withdraw your Tokkul as BTC. Withdrawals are processed manually and we have a patented dupe system so there is no chance of us or you being scammed! You can literally make money by playing our server!
Q: Why do you guys use Reddit for your community versus traditional forums? A: We feel that Reddit is a much better communication system than forums are. We also wanted to try something different! Soon there will be donator integration to the subreddit and many other new unique things.
Q: What are your eventual plans for this server? A: We plan to seriously expand our gambling minigames to provide much more entertainment and money making ways for you guys. On top of that we plan to perfect our combat system and add a more robust economy. Expect great things!
Q: Do you have any advertisements? A: Yes we have a nice budget for advertising and you should expect to see them appear before the start of April.
Q: Cases? A: We offer a mystery box where you can recieve up to $500 worth of items. Each mystery box costs $5

item.title: Vindred - SPAWN PK - BITCOIN GAMBLING
item.dc:creator: @kile392 kile392
item.description:
@kile392 wrote:

[center]

<–Home–Vote–Client–Community–>[/center]

Vindred is a special server. You get Spawn PKing, Bossing, Minigames, Cases and Gambling all in one! Loading unique OSRS items we offer you the best experience you could possible get. Join Today!

FAQ
Q: What is “Gambling”
A: At Vindred you can buy ingame tokkul as BTC or Paypal. Then you can PK, Trade, Duel, do the flower game or enter the daily lottery with said Tokkul. Whenever you want you can withdraw your Tokkul as BTC. Withdrawals are processed manually and we have a patented dupe system so there is no chance of us or you being scammed! You can literally make money by playing our server!

Q: Why do you guys use Reddit for your community versus traditional forums?
A: We feel that Reddit is a much better communication system than forums are. We also wanted to try something different! Soon there will be donator integration to the subreddit and many other new unique things.

Q: What are your eventual plans for this server?
A: We plan to seriously expand our gambling minigames to provide much more entertainment and money making ways for you guys. On top of that we plan to perfect our combat system and add a more robust economy. Expect great things!

Q: Do you have any advertisements?
A: Yes we have a nice budget for advertising and you should expect to see them appear before the start of April.

Q: Cases?
A: We offer a mystery box where you can recieve up to $500 worth of items. Each mystery box costs $5
